name: Youth Program
description: The Friendship House Youth Center provides American Indian youth, ages 8–24, with a broad range of activities and services that help instill cultural pride, academic success, and resilience in the presence of violence and substance abuse at home. Youth Events & Programs: - Teen Dance Nights - Sweat Ceremonies - Powwow dance & drumming - Academics & tutorin - Cultural arts like Silver Smithing and pine needle basketr - Traditional healing

agency: Friendship House Association of American Indians
